thread.title: Gabriel, a mighty paladin.
thread.title_full: WowVendor.com reviewed by Gabriel, a mighty paladin.

author: Gabriel, a mighty paladin.
title: Gabriel, a mighty paladin.
text:
I already used twice their powerleveling services and I'm totally happy with what they delivered. They took my order and started to level my characters instantly. Both orders was for 100-110 in 24 hours but they finished the job even faster in about 18-20 hours. When I logged in I found all the valuable items that dropped during the powerleveling nicely organized into my bags.
We used Skype for communication and the person that took care of my orders had a good english and was quite nice.
I'm a busy person, I enjoy the end game and pvp but I don't have 2-3 days to go through the story again and again. I'm very happy, I totally recommend them!
